author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IONA CONTINUES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH MINIMAL CHANGE IN INTENSITY...
summary: ...IONA CONTINUES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH MINIMAL CHANGE IN INTENSITY... As of 5:00 PM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Iona was located near 13.7, -172.7 with movement WNW at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IONA CONTINUES WEST-NORTHWESTWARD WITH MINIMAL CHANGE IN INTENSITY... As of 5:00 PM HST Thu Jul 31 the center of Iona was located near 13.7, -172.7 with movement WNW at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Iona (CP1/CP012025)
